title: http RPC deadlock
body:
I find rpc deadlock with http backend on CallContext func.

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/f213ceb83f4d915089347485721b1f99b71596f0/rpc/client.go#L277-L304

http backed use sendHTTP func.
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/f213ceb83f4d915089347485721b1f99b71596f0/rpc/http.go#L128-L150

where response send to requestOp.resp chan.
next step is waiting requestOp.wait.

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/f213ceb83f4d915089347485721b1f99b71596f0/rpc/client.go#L136-L148
but if context cancel then select chose pseudorandom case and it can be context.Done case.
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/f213ceb83f4d915089347485721b1f99b71596f0/rpc/client.go#L138-L144

in this case we try send requestOp to client.reqTimeout but it receive only in dispatch func than use only in not http backend. Or  waiting for closing client.

maybe should use 
```
if !c.isHTTP {
	select {
	case c.reqTimeout <- op:
	case <-c.closing:
	}
}
````
